content: washcloth wednesday what s it all about every week i will be adding a washcloth to the collection for each washcloth you will need oddments of dk weight cotton yarn a 3 50 mm hook and a needle for neatening ends when worked at gauge each washcloth will measure 8 square as an alternative to cotton why not use a softer yarn - make a square a week and join into a blanket or throw i ll even try to give the repeat so you can make them smaller/larger to suit hint if you re planning on joining several together leave approximately 60 cm 24 of yarn to the start and the finish for later you may not need it but better to be safe than sorry make sure you download the updated pattern every now and then to get the full collection i will be announcing updates on my facebook page https
